EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Pivotal_Roadshow_Q216.Reminder - Denver
EmailTemplate.subject: See you tomorrow at the Pivotal Cloud Native Roadshow!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for signing up to attend the Cloud Native Roadshow taking place tomorrow in Denver.
Pivotal Cloud Native Roadshow—Denver Thursday, June 23rd, 2016 8:30am – 9:30am Breakfast 9:30am – 12:00pm Sessions 12:00pm – 1:00pm Lunch 1:00pm – 3:30pm Sessions Roadshow Agenda <[[http://pivotal.io/event/pivotal-cloud-native-roadshow/denver?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=pivotal-roadshow-2016-Denver]]>
Location Galvanize Denver - Platte <[[http://www.galvanize.com/campuses/denver-platte/]]> 1644 Platte Street Denver, CO 80202 Room: Lower Level (LL) in Classroom 3 Map & Directions <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/1644+Platte+St,+Denver,+CO+80202/@39.7577737,-105.0093211,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x876c78eae5c59869:0x4db4343efa8a9eb6!8m2!3d39.7577737!4d-105.0071324]]>
Questions? Contact Patrick Gillis at pgillis@pivotal.io <[[mailto:pgillis@pivotal.io]]>.
We look forward to seeing you!
The Pivotal Team
